p: Moneim et al showed that consumption of 1,000 mg/kg flaxseed oil in rats not only depicted no toxicity but also limit the renal cytotoxicity (Abdel Moneim et al., 2011). The other studies also confirm the potential protective influence of flaxseed oil against renal toxicity through alteration biochemical and histopathological factors (Shaikh Omar, 2018). These data confirmed the low toxicity and therapeutic potency of the mentioned oil.
